title: Anatomical Heart
description:
A red anatomical heart, shown with blue or purple veins on some platforms.

Sometimes used interchangeably with ‚ù§Ô∏è Red Heart.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's anatomical heart emoji is a striking representation of the human heart, depicted with intricate detail and realistic shading that highlights its muscular structure. On Apple devices, the smooth gradients and subtle lighting give it a profound, almost medically accurate appearance, yet it retains a touch of Apple's signature warmth. This emoji is powerfully used to express deep, visceral emotions, often signifying true love, passion, or a profound connection beyond superficial affection.
